buildCommand:
if [ ! -d flutter ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1; fi && flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web && flutter/bin/flutter pub get && printf 'EMAILJS_SERVICE_ID=%s
EMAILJS_TEMPLATE_ID=%s
EMAILJS_PUBLIC_KEY=%s
EMAILJS_TO_EMAIL=%s
' "$EMAILJS_SERVICE_ID" "$EMAILJS_TEMPLATE_ID" "$EMAILJS_PUBLIC_KEY" "$EMAILJS_TO_EMAIL" > .env && flutter/bin/flutter build web --release
